contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 25, 1999 D West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-third-section
None
Memorial Hall, Burry Port, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - soprano - Cross Keys. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
July 10, 2015, 6:45 p.m. July 3, 2020, 3:50 p.m.
1 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
2 Cwmbran Band John Burns
3 Oakdale Silver Band Ron Probyn
4 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ceri Lewis
5 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Thomas Charlton
6 Vale of Glamorgan Band Ivor Barnett
7 Glynneath Silver Band William Cross
Withdrawn Pembroke Borough Band Peter Evans
